name: create_event
description: Create a new event that tickets can be pulled for.

options.name: event
options.description: The name of the event, this will be used to pull tickets.

options.name: start_time
options.description: The date in which the event will start in JST. Format: YYYY-mm-dd:HH:MM:SS ex. 2023-07-17:20:00:00
